mapper.select: select t2.* from (select mc.num seq ,mc.title title ,mc.content content ,DATE_FORMAT(mc.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') regDate ,mc.customer_seq customerSeq ,mc.id ,mc.answer from member_customer mc ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc
select count(*) as count from member_customer
select count(*) as count from member_customer where ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select t2.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS seq ,mc.title ,mc.content content ,DATE_FORMAT(mc.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') regDate ,mc.customer_seq customerSeq ,mc.id ,mc.answer from customer mc ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') and mc.id is not null and mc.role = 'CUSTOMER' ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc
